User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.16) Gecko/20110319 Firefox/3.6.16 (.NET CLR 3.5.30729)
Build ID: 20110319135224

Steps to reproduce:

1. create a test run with 2 test cases
2. pass the first test case
3. mark the second test case as running
4. pass the second test case
5. look at the test case run history for test case 1 and test case 2


Actual results:

1. I cannot find a way to see the time it took to complete test case 2 (I assume this is the difference between the moments when I marked the test case as running and passed the test case. Note that Testopia reports a non-zero average time for test case 2)
2. cannot find a way to modify the test run time for test case 1 and test case 2


Expected results:

1. I'd like Testopia to provide a column called 'run time' for each test case run record. (Since Testopia offers the Average Time field for a test case the inability to view the test case run values the average is calculated from looks like a bug)
2. The column should be updatable.
3. The Testopia access control system should provide a way to prevent individual users (testers) from modifying test run time columns (values)
